column4: has anyone here sucessfully set up XP as a virtual machine on VMplayer?
what did you use to set up your vmdk file?

I used the vmware-server GUI (on dapper) to set it up.  When I upgrade to edgy vmware stopped working--this solved that problem: http://blog.bz2.nl/2006/10/27/vmware-server-console-on-ubuntu-610-edgy-eft-hangs/
